DOC.brief_summary: Polymerization shrinkage remain one primary disadvantage composite resin restorative material ( tooth-colored filling ) . To minimize effect polymerization shrinkage restorative treatment , 3M ESPE company develop composite resin call Filtek Bulk Fill Posterior Restorative . Its decreased polymerization shrinkage property allow material insert one single increment , expedite treatment . This clinical trial design evaluate performance new bulk fill composite resin Class II ( two-surface posterior ) filling .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Investigation New Bulk Fill Composite Resin Restoration Posterior Teeth
